name: Modern Widescreen LDS.ORG
description: Based off bash-ninja's "Lds.org Better Widescreen", with detailed tweaks to adapt to the modern site's theme.
additional_info:
v1.0 - Release!
  • Expanded homepage hero section.
  • Centered carousel banners in subpages (see Family History subpage).
  • Enlarged thumbnail grids* and eradicated line break artifacts that affected grid alignment uniformity.
  • Cut down on margins that confined text too much when using screens wider than 1500px.
  • Increased button size in a few places, but there's still much to edit.
*Note that in a few places, images are blown up larger than their original dimensions. They will look grainy. Sorry in advance.
